name: Iowa City
bio: This is the first time I've been to the States. Everything's new to me! This is a quite, nice town. Love it!

name: Shanghai
bio: I was studying in Tongji University in Shanghai from 2010 to 2014. Big city and I met my best friends here.

name: Guangzhou (Canton)
bio: This is the city that I grew up in. Nice people, nice food and nice weather. (A bit wet, I've got to say)
